channel.title: Having a client issue
channel.description: does anyone know what his means. i this client wont open on my friends computer but it will work on my computer. is there like a program he is missing. if so what is it because i have no idea what this means?

item.title: Having a client issue
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

You’ve provided almost no information regarding your problem. Is the problem regarding execution, when you launch the client? Are you using a batch script to open the client, such as run.bat? If it is closing (won’t open) as soon as you open it, add the “PAUSE” at the end of the batch script, save, run again and post what prints out. Other then that, no one can help you without more information.

Read full topic
